name: 3D Football Madness
description:
Originally released the 15th of June, 2014, this is the first sequel project I've worked on.

Play as either Green Guy or Yellow Guy in this 2 player (or 1 player playing both characters) local only game. The goal is to get the ball in the opponents goal while navigating through a sea of constantly falling pills. As a game, it's improved over its predecessor, but if you thought it was hard in a 2D environment, try it in 3D!

Note: There seems to be some problems if too many keyboard inputs are pressed at once, so beware.

Music is not done by me. Full list of credits can be found in the Read Me found in the .rar.
